title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 158.7 - Place for keeping records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 158.7 - Place for keeping records

State Regulations

The books and records required by this Subchapter must
be kept at locations accessible to the representatives of the Tax Commission, and must be made available for inspection by such
representatives. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
158.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
